verses.verse: A Song, a Psalm of David. My heart <WH3820> is fixed <WH3559>, O God <WH430>; I will sing <WH7891>, yea <WH2167>, I will sing praises, even with my glory <WH3519>.
Awake <WH5782>, psaltery <WH5035> and harp <WH3658>: I myself will awake <WH5782> right early <WH7837>.
I will give thanks <WH3034> unto thee <WH3068>, O Jehovah, among the peoples <WH5971>; And I will sing praises <WH2167> unto thee among the nations <WH3816>.
For thy lovingkindness <WH2617> is great <WH1419> above the heavens <WH8064>; And thy truth <WH571> reacheth unto the skies <WH7834>.
Be thou exalted <WH7311>, O God <WH430>, above the heavens <WH8064>, And thy glory <WH3519> above all the earth <WH776>.
That thy beloved <WH3039> may be delivered <WH2502>, Save <WH3467> with thy right hand <WH3225>, and answer us <WH6030>.
God <WH430> hath spoken <WH1696> in his holiness <WH6944>: I will exult <WH5937>; I will divide <WH2505> Shechem <WH7927>, and mete out <WH4058> the valley <WH6010> of Succoth <WH5523>.
Gilead <WH1568> is mine <WH4519>; Manasseh is mine <WH669>; Ephraim also is the defence <WH4581> of my head <WH7218>; Judah <WH3063> is my sceptre <WH2710>.
Moab <WH4124> is my washpot <WH7366>; Upon Edom <WH123> will I cast <WH7993> my shoe <WH5275>; Over Philistia <WH6429> will I shout <WH7321>.
Who will bring <WH2986> me into the fortified <WH4013> city <WH5892>? Who hath led <WH5148> me unto Edom <WH123>?
Hast not thou cast us off <WH2186>, O God <WH430>? And thou goest not forth <WH3318>, O God <WH430>, with our hosts <WH6635>.
Give <WH3051> us help <WH5833> against the adversary <WH6862>; For vain <WH7723> is the help <WH8668> of man <WH120>.
Through God <WH430> we shall do <WH6213> valiantly <WH2428>: For he it is that will tread down <WH947> our adversaries <WH6862>.
